channel.title: Jules on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in Jules on ZooBerry

item.title: Aliwalia
item.description: This huge carnivore will eat meat and fish. It can bring down small or large prey and could reach length of twelve metres.

item.title: Dicynodont Pack
item.description: A pack of four dicynodonts, which are a group of therapsids the Permian and Triassic.
